com.i2group.apollo.itemstoreapi

Interface IStatelessHandler


  • public interface IStatelessHandler
    A handler that receives Items and IEvents from i2 Analyze, and processes them statelessly.

    For example, the handler might send the information it receives to an external system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleEvents(Map<IEvent,Item> itemsKeyedByEvent)
      Handles a batch of events that have been processed by the item store.

    • Method Detail

      • handleEvents

        void handleEvents(Map<IEvent,Item> itemsKeyedByEvent)
        Handles a batch of events that have been processed by the item store.

        Note: Multiple instances of IStatelessHandler might be invoked concurrently. Therefore, handler instances must not share state. However, a given handler instance will only be invoked by a single thread.

        Parameters:
        itemsKeyedByEvent - A map containing IEvents and the latest versions of the Items they refer to. If the IEvent modified the Item, that modification is reflected in the received version.
